500error: Internal error. Main page will be loaded in a few seconds. Please contact the development team if this error persists.
sslrequired: Secure connection is required to use this page

app.placeholder: This part of the site is under development. Please come back later!

user.disclaimer: By signing up you agree to our terms of use and privacy policies.
user.resetSent: Reset code sent, please check your e-mail.
user.resetError: An error occurred while trying to change your password. Is the e-mail and verification code correct?
user.registrationerror: An error has occurred. Please check the fields and try again.
user.emailCannotChange: Sadly, we do not allow changing your e-mail at this time.
user.2FADisable: Click here to disable two factor authorisation.
user.deleteWarning: Warning - account deletion is irreversible. This process will completely nuke your account and your public profile, but it will not delete any comments or payments you've made. This process is only avaulable if you haven't created a project yet. To continue please enter your account details below. If you have a verified e-mail, you will need to confirm the deletion by clicking on the URL sent.
user.biographyPlaceholder: Tell us more about yourself in 250 characters
user.deleteFailure: An error occurred while deleting an element. Please try again later.
user.saveFailure: An error occurred while saving an element. Please try again later.
user.invalidresetcode: The reset code you entered is invalid.
user.signinerror: An unknown problem occurred while attempting to sign in. Please try again later.

home.registrationSuccess: Registration was successful. Please check your e-mail to confirm your account

discoverPage.paginationError: Can't find any more projects with the applied filters
discoverPage.connectionError: An error occurred while connecting to the server
discoverPage.nsfw: Project might contain pornographic or otherwise for minors unsuitable content. Continue?

image.uploadfailure: An error occurred while uploading an image

newproject.title: New project
newproject.aboutproject: Why don't you tell us more about your project then?
newproject.name: Name
newproject.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a short description about your project that will be shown on the project list. Maximum length is 250 characters.
newproject.longdescription: Longer description about project. Visible on the project page - everything goes!
newproject.successfulDonationMessage: Message to display on successful donation
newproject.successfulDonationVideo: Video to display on a successful donation
newproject.moneyamount: How much money do you need? (in Euros)
newproject.disclaimer: Once you click on the preview button, your project will be added to a queue to be reviewed by our administrators. It is during this review step that the account to which the money will be sent to will be specified. Until your project is verified and approved you can always use the 'create project' tab to modify its' details.
newproject.longdescriptionPlaceholder: Enter information about your project, no limits. Currently inline media (pictures, etc.) isn't supported.
newproject.finaliseFailure: An error occurred while trying to publish your project. Please try again.
newproject.finaliseSuccess: Your project has been published successfully. Please wait while an administrator will verify your project.
newproject.publishFailure: An error occurred while we tried to publish your project. Please try again later and if it happens again please contact us.
newproject.publishSuccess: Your project has been published successfully! Good luck!
newproject.goalDescriptionPlaceholder: What are you trying to achieve?
newproject.rewardDescriptionPlaceholder: What are you giving your users for a donation?

project.notPublished: This project hasn't been published yet, and as such is only visible to you.
